short_description: Elevate Alberta Ballet globally by fusing classical mastery with contemporary energy to captivate modern audiences and keep the repertoire culturally relevant.
Transform Alberta Ballet’s productions into visually stunning, immersive experiences while prioritising sustainability, operational efficiency, and workforce collaboration.
Create compelling contemporary dance productions that resonate with modern audiences by combining current themes, multi-sensory elements, and cross-disciplinary collaborations.

Establish Alberta Ballet as a leader in contemporary ballet by collaborating with celebrated choreographers, staging world-class works, and turning productions into multidisciplinary cultural events and tours.

plan_anchor: “Elevate Artistic Excellence” within Objective 5: Attracting Talent
short_description: Build a world-class ballet company by attracting top-tier dancers, collaborating with renowned choreographers, and partnering with visionary designers to create visually stunning productions and branding.

objective_title: Equip Students with Classical & Contemporary Proficiency
short_description: Equip Alberta Ballet School students with the technical proficiency and versatility needed to excel in both classical and contemporary ballet, aligned with the company’s artistic vision.

plan_anchor: “Form strategic partnerships with prestigious ballet and dance brands” (sub-objective)
objective_title: Strategic School Partnerships with Ballet & Dance Brands
short_description: Form strategic partnerships with prestigious ballet and dance brands to reinforce the international prestige of Alberta Ballet and its School through guest teachers, choreographers, and guest artists.

Leverage international company tours, the Artistic Director’s network, and Alberta Ballet School alumni to attract talented young dancers, provide accessible training opportunities, and elevate the School’s reputation worldwide.

plan_anchor: “Position Alberta Ballet School as a leader in dance education” (sub-objective)
objective_title: Position Alberta Ballet School as a Leader in Dance Education
short_description: Position Alberta Ballet School as a leader in dance education by showcasing world-class training, its connection to the professional company, and proactive recruitment locally, nationally, and internationally.

objective_title: Recruit and Support a Diverse, Inclusive Student Body
short_description: Recruit and support a globally diverse and inclusive student body by providing accessible opportunities, professional development, and targeted initiatives for under-represented groups (including increased male enrolment).
Ensure people from communities throughout Alberta can experience the power of dance, regardless of geographic or socio-economic status barriers, through classes, tickets, and performances.
Increase participation in recreational ballet classes while fostering inclusivity, retention, and clear pathways for talent development.

Provide accessible ballet experiences to underserved and vulnerable communities, fostering inclusivity, cultural exchange, and geographic reach through free/discounted tickets and culturally inclusive programs.

plan_anchor: “Build lasting connections with recreational ballet students…” (sub-objective)
objective_title: Connect Recreational Students & Families to the Company
short_description: Build lasting connections with recreational students and their families by providing meaningful opportunities to engage with Alberta Ballet productions, dancers, and training programmes, including introductory outreach in underserved neighbourhoods.
Tour the world and captivate audiences by showcasing Alberta Ballet on prestigious stages abroad, elevating global brand recognition and diversifying revenue streams.

Tailor repertoire, media campaigns, and key relationships to each region’s cultural preferences (Europe, Middle East, South America) to enhance international reputation and build sustainable touring opportunities.

plan_anchor: “Build collaborations with luxury brands, Middle Eastern influencers…” (sub-objective)
short_description: Build collaborations with luxury brands, Middle Eastern influencers, and technology innovators to expand Alberta Ballet’s reach, engage elite audiences, and secure sustainable funding.

Centralise operations in a modern, versatile Calgary facility to foster collaboration, improve efficiency, increase programme capacity, enhance community engagement, and support revenue generation, backed by a comprehensive fundraising strategy.

Position Alberta Ballet as a cultural cornerstone and symbol of Alberta pride while expanding its reputation far beyond provincial borders through storytelling, partnerships, and high-profile activity.

plan_anchor: “Rebuild our loyal audience base to 100,000 tickets each year…” (sub-objective)
objective_title: Rebuild Loyal Audience Base to 100,000 Tickets per Year
short_description: Rebuild Alberta Ballet’s loyal audience base to 100,000 tickets annually by creating immersive, emotionally resonant experiences and using targeted, experiential, and thematic marketing to deepen long-term commitment.

plan_anchor: “Build user-friendly, visually compelling, and purpose-driven websites…” (sub-objective)
short_description: Build user-friendly, visually compelling, purpose-driven websites for Alberta Ballet’s Company, School, and Community initiatives to drive engagement, ticket sales, and funding opportunities.

Leverage social media and digital platforms to highlight performances, training programmes, and community initiatives, connecting with local and international audiences and strengthening Alberta Ballet’s brand.

objective_title: People & Culture ‚Äì Safe, Inclusive, High-Performing Workplace
short_description: Create a safe, inclusive, and high-performing workplace by investing in leadership capability, staff wellbeing, diversity and inclusion, and consistent people policies across the organisation.

Develop and sustain a high-performing, strategically aligned Board of Directors through disciplined recruitment and onboarding, ongoing education, diversity of perspectives, and regular evaluation of board effectiveness.
Embed regular employee, student, and parent feedback loops to inform leadership decisions, strengthen organisational culture, and continuously improve programmes and services.
